name: Pickaxe friends
description:
"Survival strategy escape simulator of Ganodab friends trapped in a biotech factory that has gone out of control"

Stay alive
Prepare for food and medical treatment and survive in many different situations

Be strategic
Make the most of every opportunity, whether it's luck or skill.

Escape.
The tricky part is getting out of here anyway.
No matter how long you last, there has to be an end.

Simulator
You make the decisions, the battles are automatic, you decide what will happen.
Enjoy
